```{r}
library(dslabs)
data("tissue_gene_expression")

d <- dist(tissue_gene_expression$x - rowMeans(tissue_gene_expression$x))
h <-hclust(d)


plot(h, cex = 0.65, main = "", xlab = "")

groups <- cutree(h, k = 7)
groups
#names(groups)[groups==4]
```
```{r}
x_0 <- d
x_0[is.na(x_0)] <- 0
k <- kmeans(x_0, centers = 7)
k
groups <- k$cluster
groups
```
